description: A collection of equipment at one common system voltage forming a switchgear. The equipment typically consist of breakers, busbars, instrumentation, control, regulation and protection devices as well as assemblies of all these.

contents.name: BaseVoltage
contents.description: The base voltage used for all equipment within the voltage level.

contents.name: Substation
contents.description: The substation of the voltage level.

contents.name: highVoltageLimit
contents.description: The bus bar's high voltage limit

contents.name: lowVoltageLimit
contents.description: The bus bar's low voltage limit
